name: Operation: Sand
description:
Deluxe Edition Coming Soon!
Includes: Base Game, Stratagy Guide, and Expansion Pack 1: Ground Zero
It will be $0.99 USD.

An Episodic FPS set in the near future, where the U.S ad just won a war against Russia, or so they thought... Step into the shoes of Lucas Roberts, as you try to find your best friend among the chaos of war.

Current finished modes: Single Player Campaign (Episode 1 out of 5)

Modes in progress: Online Multiplayer(Requires Steam & GameGuru), Co-Op Spec-Ops Mode (Requires Steam & GameGuru)
